Gang patch law: Police ready to enforce gang patch ban that becomes law on November 21 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/gang-patch-law-police-ready-to-enforce-gang-patch-ban-that-becomes-law-on-november-21/2HD5GCYMP5HS5LMGEQAHH4VUAE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/gang-patch-law-police-ready-to-enforce-gang-patch-ban-that-becomes-law-on-november-21/2HD5GCYMP5HS5LMGEQAHH4VUAE/ Bill HickmanPolice have met with gangs to discuss the new legislation. Wed, 13 Nov 2024 17:35:03 +0000 Gang patches will be banned from being worn in public from November 21.
Wairakei Resort Golf Course back in action after Cyclone Gabrielle damage https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/wairakei-resort-golf-course-back-in-action-after-cyclone-gabrielle-damage/IHYIVR6AJZFI5O6D5HKTSFWRQA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/wairakei-resort-golf-course-back-in-action-after-cyclone-gabrielle-damage/IHYIVR6AJZFI5O6D5HKTSFWRQA/ Waikato Herald staff reporterThe picturesque course was seriously damaged after Cyclone Gabrielle. Wed, 13 Nov 2024 17:30:00 +0000 Singapore-based Kevin Peeris, senior vice-president of Bayview International Hotels & Resorts, left, with Wairakei Resort Taupō resort manager David Hopcroft on the recently re-opened golf course. Behind them are signs of the cyclone-stripped hillside.
